company_info.Company Description: We are involved in manpower resources to host of leading companies in various fields (IT & Non IT ).Our firm has excellent database of professional from the field of marketing engineering accounts human resources and other fields. The database is reviewed, revises and updated constantly. Ever since its inception the company has been fairly successful towards achieving its goal of providing the best in every field. Email Resume resumes.hrdesire@gmail.com
